name: Boomi Flow AWS Rekognition Service
description: A plugin that allows your Boomi Flow apps to use the AWS Rekognition API

S3_BUCKET.description: The AWS S3 bucket used to store uploads temporarily

S3_ACCESS_KEY.description: A valid AWS S3 access key used to store uploads temporarily

S3_SECRET_KEY.description: A valid AWS S3 secret key used to store uploads temporarily
